screen_desc: The screenshot displays a product listing on Walmart's mobile website for a Monoprice USB Type-A to USB Type-B 2.0 Cable, priced at $44.99. The product includes a pack of five 6-foot cables, and the item has a 4.5-star rating from 167 reviews. Below the product, there is an option to add it to the cart and select the quantity. A promotional ad for the Walmart shopping app appears at the bottom, encouraging users to download it for easier shopping and order tracking.
